sentences.en: an adequate supply of hot water
sentences.cn: 热水供应充足

sentences.en: Can plants obtain adequate nourishment from such poor soil?
sentences.cn: 土壤这样贫瘠，植物能获得足够的养分吗？

sentences.en: Every effect must have an adequate cause.
sentences.cn: 每一种结果都必须有充分的原因.

sentences.en: Farmers have been slow to make adequate provision for their retirement.
sentences.cn: 农民们迟迟没有为退休做好适当安排。

sentences.en: Food in the dining car was adequate, if uninspired.
sentences.cn: 餐车里的食品虽然量足够多，但花样太少。

sentences.en: His wages are adequate to support three people.
sentences.cn: 他的工资够养活三口人.

sentences.en: Inspectors checked that there was adequate ventilation.
sentences.cn: 检查员已检查过,通风良好.

sentences.en: Make sure that the firm's insurance cover is adequate.
sentences.cn: 确保该公司上了足够的保险。

sentences.en: One in four people worldwide are without adequate homes.
sentences.cn: 世界上1/4的人没有足够的住房。

sentences.en: She is prepared to offer me an amount adequate to purchase another house.
sentences.cn: 她准备好了给我一笔足以购买另一所房子的钱。

sentences.en: Some creams we tested failed to give adequate protection against UV light.
sentences.cn: 我们检测的有些防晒霜不能提供足够的防紫外线保护。

sentences.en: The city's water supply is no longer adequate for its need.
sentences.cn: 这个城市的供水已不敷需求.

sentences.en: The company has yet to provide an adequate explanation for its actions.
sentences.cn: 该公司对其行动仍未作出充分解释。

sentences.en: The standard of his work is barely adequate .
sentences.cn: 他的工作水准勉强合格。

sentences.en: The standard of his work is barely adequate.
sentences.cn: 他的工作水准勉强合格。

sentences.en: There must be adequate recompense for workers who lose their jobs.
sentences.cn: 必须给失业的工人足够的补偿。

sentences.en: There was adequate rain and snow last winter.
sentences.cn: 去年冬天雨雪充足.

sentences.en: Though a bit too old, he is still adequate to the work.
sentences.cn: 虽然他年纪大了点, 却仍能胜任这项工作.

sentences.en: Until the beating, Cantanco's eyesight had been weak, but adequate.
sentences.cn: 挨打前坎坦科的视力就一直很弱，不过也还勉强看得见。

sentences.en: We must mix work with adequate rest.
sentences.cn: 我们必须劳逸结合.

sentences.en: Wear clothes that provide adequate protection against the wind and rain.
sentences.cn: 穿上足以防风雨的衣服。

sentences.en: Without adequate information, many students choose a college almost blindly.
sentences.cn: 因为缺少足够的信息，许多学生都是近乎盲目地选择大学。

phrases.tran_cn: 胜任……的；对……是足够的；适合……的

trans.tran_cn: 足够的，合格的，合乎需要的
trans.tran_en: enough in quantity or of a good enough quality for a particular purpose
